venue.address_2: Opposite Sears entrance at Galleria Ma
venue.name: VFW

item.description:
Live Music, Singles Networking, Cheap Drinks, Pool table

Attention Party goers, Musicians, Singles & Singers!! Come
join the party at the Wed Night Open mike! Everyone Welcome.
No cover charge - Play pool or music solo or with backing band.
All instruments and styles welcome. Originals, covers, blues,
jazz, classic rock, R&B, Motown, folk, etc. Back up band with
drums, bass, guitar, and Songlist for singers.

Bring your friends for the party, network, play pool, and meet, interesting people &
singles. Inexpensive drinks. Free beer or wine for
exceptional performances."



The most important thing to know as a boozer is that Beer is $2.75 to $3.75 for imports, glass of wine $3.00; very reasonably priced mixed drinks also!
item.name: Last minute but GOOOOOOOD!
